title: Riot deleting comments
body:
So basically what i want to ask is that if you are deleting a comment off the boards for being reported or whatever, instead of giving some shitty copy paste bullshit, actually give me a copy and paste of the comment you deleted?

I have had 2 comments deleted in the past couple of days, one was legitimately just because i said someone was bad, the other, i really don't even know what comment got deleted, you know, because you delete them without telling us anything.

replies.body: only two deleted? lmao git gud.
Good job riot. Be less rude to people in future, Jason.
Not at all what this is about, I'll admit I'm an asshole at times, but at least if i can look at what i said i can not sit here wondering what i did that actually made someone report it.
they're too busy clicking 3 buttons and charging people 5 bucks a chroma skin to care about anything else to do with league. come at me rito
